chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall m : state, sproductr_1_def m -> forall m0 : state, sproductr_1_def m0 -> sproductr_1_def (M2 prec_list m m0)

Premises:
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
state = Map prec_list : Set
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
sproductr_1_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p s) c = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 : state -> Prop
sproductl_1_2 : forall m : state, sproductl_1_def m -> forall m0 : state, sproductl_1_def m0 -> sproductl_1_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
sproductl_0_2 : forall m : state, sproductl_0_def m -> forall m0 : state, sproductl_0_def m0 -> sproductl_0_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
sproductr_0_2 : forall m : state, sproductr_0_def m -> forall m0 : state, sproductr_0_def m0 -> sproductr_0_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
predta_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m0 -> predta_compatible_compat_def (M2 state m m0)
st_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m0 -> st_compatible_compat_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
sproductr_1_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : prec_list), sproductr_1_def (M1 prec_list a a0)
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
borne_0_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map prec_list) (p : prec_list), (prec_in_state m0 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m0) -> (prec_in_state m1 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m1) -> prec_in_state (M2 prec_list m0 m1) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M2 prec_list m0 m1)
sproductl_0_3 : forall m : state, sproductl_0_def m
sproductr_0_3 : forall m : state, sproductr_0_def m
sproductl_1_3 : forall m : state, sproductl_1_def m
borne_1_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map state) (s : state), (state_in_dta m0 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m0) -> (state_in_dta m1 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m1) -> state_in_dta (M2 state m0 m1) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M2 state m0 m1)
M2_eqmap_1 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m0 m2
mpl_compat_2 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3
mpl_compat_1 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s0 s2
MapDisjoint_M2 : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B m0 m2 -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3 -> MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3)
MapDisjoint_M2_l : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m0 m2
MapGet_M2_bit_0_0 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = false -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m (N.div2 a)
mapcanon_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (y : A), P (M1 A a y)) -> (forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> P m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> P m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> P (M2 A m1 m2)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon A m -> P m
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
MapGet_M2_bit_0_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = true -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m' (N.div2 a)
pl_produit_path_incl_def_1 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
M2_eqmap_2 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m1 m3
st_compatible_compat : forall s0 s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1
mpl_compat_sym : forall s0 s1 : state, mpl_compat s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s1 s0
beq_nat_complete : forall n m : nat, (n =? m) = true -> n = m
pl_produit_path_incl_def_0 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path) (a : ad) (l : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp0 (prec_cons a pl0 prec_empty) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_produit_path_incl_def_3 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 /\ pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop

```coq
unfold sproductr_1_def. intros m Hm m0 Hm0. apply Map_rect with (P := fun s => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p s) c = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1).
+ apply sproductl_1_2.
+ apply sproductl_0_3.
+ apply sproductr_0_3.
+ apply sproductl_1_3.
+ intros a p c r Hr. destruct Hr as [r0 [r1 [Hr0 Hr1]]]. rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := M2 prec_list m m0) (m3 := M2 prec_list m m0). rewrite <- Hm0. rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := M1 prec_list a p) (m3 := M2 prec_list m m0). rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := s) (m3 := M2 prec_list m m0). rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := M1 prec_list a p) (m3 := s). rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := s) (m3 := s). rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := M1 prec_list a p) (m3 := s).
Qed.

original: unfold sproductr_1_def. intros m Hm m0 Hm0. apply Map_rect with (P := fun s => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p s) c = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1). + apply sproductl_1_2. + apply sproductl_0_3. + apply sproductr_0_3. + apply sproductl_1_3. + intros a p c r Hr. destruct Hr as [r0 [r1 [Hr0 Hr1]]]. rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := M2 prec_list m m0) (m3 := M2 prec_list m m0). rewrite <- Hm0. rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := M1 prec_list a p) (m3 := M2 prec_list m m0). rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := s) (m3 := M2 prec_list m m0). rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := M1 prec_list a p) (m3 := s). rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := s) (m3 := s). rewrite <- M2_eqmap_1 with (m0 := m) (m1 := m0) (m2 := M1 prec_list a p) (m3 := s).
